= follower =

== Syntax ==
 unitptr.follower

== Field Type ==
 unitptr (Read-only)

== Description ==
The follower field returns the first follower of a PC or NPC character. This field provides access to the character that is following the specified unit.

If the character has no followers, this field returns null.

== Return Value ==
Returns a unitptr pointing to the first follower, or null if there are no followers.

== Example ==
 dilbegin check_followers();
 var
    first_follower : unitptr;
    
 code
 {
    if (self.follower)
    {
        act("You have at least one follower: $3n", A_ALWAYS, self, null, self.follower, TO_CHAR);
    }
    else
    {
        act("You have no followers.", A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
    }
    return;
 } dilend

== Notes ==
* This field is read-only and cannot be modified directly
* Only returns the first follower in the chain
* To access all followers, use a foreach loop in the local environment
* The field returns null if the character has no followers
* This field is only available for PC and NPC unit types (UNIT_ST_PC and UNIT_ST_NPC)
